channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Architectural Scalability】架构可扩展性速成课程
item.description: 【In today's interconnected world, software applications have a global reach, serving users from diverse geographical locations.】在当今互联的世界中，软件应用程序具有全球影响力，为来自不同地理位置的用户提供服务。

item.title: 【EP123: What is a Load Balancer? 】EP123：什么是负载均衡器？
item.description: 【This week’s system design refresher:】本周的系统设计复习：

item.title: 【How Facebook Syncs Time Across Millions of Servers】Facebook 如何在数百万台服务器之间同步时间
【Counting Billions of Content Usage at Canva】统计 Canva 数十亿内容的使用情况
item.description: 【Hands-on Rust Developer Workshop: Build a Low-Latency Social Media App (Sponsored)】Rust 开发人员实践研讨会：构建低延迟社交媒体应用程序（赞助）

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Microservices Design Patterns】微服务设计模式速成课程
item.description: 【Microservices architecture has gained popularity for its ability to improve the flexibility, testability, and scalability of software systems.】微服务架构因其能够提高软件系统的灵活性、可测试性和可扩展性而受到欢迎。

item.title: 【"Tidying" Code】“整理”代码
item.description: 【I’ve found my new favorite book on refactoring code.】我找到了我最喜欢的关于重构代码的新书。

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Domain-Driven Design】领域驱动设计速成课程
item.description: 【Developing software for complex domains is a challenging task.】为复杂领域开发软件是一项具有挑战性的任务。

item.title: 【EP124: How does SSH work?】EP124：SSH 是如何工作的？

item.title: 【How Stripe Scaled to 5 Million Database Queries Per Second】Stripe 如何扩展到每秒 500 万次数据库查询
item.description: 【WorkOS: modern identity platform for B2B SaaS (Sponsored) Start selling to enterprises with just a few lines of code. → WorkOS provides a complete User Management solution along with SSO, SCIM, RBAC, & FGA. → Unlike other auth providers that rely on user-centric models, WorkOS is designed for B2B SaaS with an org modeling approach.】WorkOS：B2B SaaS 的现代身份平台（赞助）只需几行代码即可开始向企业销售。 → WorkOS 提供完整的用户管理解决方案以及 SSO、SCIM、RBAC 和 FGA。 → 与其他依赖以用户为中心的模型的身份验证提供商不同，WorkOS 专为采用组织建模方法的 B2B SaaS 设计。
